name: @eris/image
description: Collection of image manipulation libraries for node and the browser.

scripts.build: npm run build:ts && npm run build:wasm && npm run build:rollup && npm run build:rollup:minify
scripts.build:wasm: cd wasm && wasm-pack build && cp ./pkg/eris_image_bg.wasm ../demo/bundle.wasm && cp ./pkg/eris_image_bg.wasm ../dist/bundle.wasm
scripts.build:rollup: rollup -c rollup.config.js && cp dist/bundle.js demo/ && cp dist/browser-index.d.ts dist/bundle.d.ts
scripts.build:rollup:minify: cross-env MINIFY=true rollup -c rollup.config.js && cp dist/bundle.min.js demo/
scripts.test: npm run test:lint && npm run test:unit

author: Patrick Hulce <patrick.hulce@gmail.com>
